$Super Home Item Hack [Bully@Wiiplaza]
28585ee2 efff1000
8000000e 00000007
e0000000 00000000
28585ee2 feff0100
8000000e 00000001
e0000000 00000000
28585ee2 ffef0010
8000000e 00000014
e2000001 00000000
48000000 806df9d8
de000000 80008180
9421000e 0000008c
e0000000 80008000
28585ee2 efff1000
8000000e 00000003
e0000000 00000000
28585ee2 feff0100
8000000e 00000008
e0000000 00000000
28585ee2 ffef0010
8000000e 00000005
e2000001 00000000
48000000 806df788
de000000 80008180
9421000e 00000250
e0000000 80008000
*Rocci's Notes: I don't understand what this is supposed to do, but it does manipulate items.
*This is the first complete working item hack for Mario Strikers, since it also modifies the amount of the items, means that every item now works!!*
**Instructions*
*3x Mushroom: hold -
*Red Shells: hold 2
*Captain Power: hold +
*If last item was Mushroom, you have permanent freeze shells (if you dont press another item button)
*If last item was red shell, you have permanent stars (if you dont press another item button)
*If last item was captain power, you have permanent Bomb Hail (if you dont press another item button)

DE000000 80008180
14000BF4 000000ZZ
E0000000 80008000
*Incomplete version, only works for single items yet*

*2 = The HEX amount of goals teams will get for every goal*

41820008 EC42182A
71250001 41820008
EC421828 D04A0678
4E800020 00000000
*Control Kritter - new version that works in multiplayer!
*
*On any controller...
*Press - to take control of home kritter
*Press + to take control of away kritter
*Press 2 to stop controlling kritters
*
*If a kritter is already being controller by another player, you won't be able to take control of him until that player stops controlling him
